summary: This is a forwarded email from an individual to 'Jason' expressing intent to share updates about actions taken 'against Epstein & Co.' The sender is in NYC and wishes to catch up.

persons.name: Jason
persons.context: Recipient of an email where the sender expresses intent to share updates about actions against Epstein & Co.

keyFacts: An individual is in NYC and has updates regarding actions 'against Epstein & Co.'
The communication is a forwarded email dated April 1, 2019.
The sender expresses a desire to catch up with Jason to share these updates.
